title: Rasta Pasta
directions: Cook pasta according to package instructions to al dente. Drain and set aside. Season chicken breasts all over with 1 tablespoon jerk seasoning and salt. In a large skillet over medium heat, heat 1 tablespoon oil. Cook chicken until golden and no longer pink, 8 minutes per side. Remove from pan and set aside to rest.
Add remaining oil and cook peppers until mostly tender, 4 to 5 minutes. Add green onions and garlic and cookÂ until fragrant, 1 minute. Season with remaining jerk seasoning.
Add chicken stock and heavy cream and let simmer until thickened, 5 minutes. Slice chicken. Add Parmesan and stir until melted, then add pasta and chicken and toss until completely combined.
Garnish with green onions and more Parmesan and serve.
ingredients: sliced green onions, plus more for garnish
freshly grated Parmesan, plus more for garnish
